Title: Water
Plot: Lt. Sharon Valerii wakes up soaking wet in the tool room with an explosive charge in her duffel bag. Shortly afterward, a mysterious explosion destroys all the port-side water tanks on Galactica, creating a crisis for the entire fleet. Sharon can't remember a thing, but all the evidence points to her as a saboteur. She confesses her concern to Chief Tyrol, but he can't believe she's responsible.
GuestStars: Donnelly Rhodes, Jill Teed, Aaron Douglas, Tobias Mehler, Colby Johannson, Bill Meilen, Bodi Olmos, Luciana Carro, Terry Chen
